Text: World UFO Day is an awareness day for people to gather together and watch the skies for unidentified flying objects.
Triplets:<World UFO Day
1:
--------------------
Text: World UFO Day:  The day is celebrated by some on June 24, and others on July 2.
Triplets:<World UFO Day
2:
--------------------
<Text: World UFO Day:  June 24 is the date that aviator Kenneth Arnold reported what is generally considered to be the first widely reported unidentified flying object sighting in the United States, while July 2 commemorates the supposed UFO crash in the 1947 Roswell UFO Incident.>
Triplets:<June 24
